text: brasenbae anak teangpir( a ai shah ning ha hv saoh)sarphap tosakamhosa champoh a l laoh ( trong nung aphytosa dl anak teang pir cheaminkhan) proh chea karpit nasa duong chetd robsa anak teangpir ban torotn tow rk avei del na pi min chaul chetd . te brasenbae anak teangpir chuoyoknea brachheang nung keat( mou ham meat) vinh noh ( keat nung mean anak chuoy) . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anak keapear keat haey chi pri l ning anak del sang ampeula troemotrauv nei banda anak mean chomnue promteang mea la ai kat ka chea anak chuoy keat kraoypi noh der
